description: Red Hat noticed a customized IngressController in the ‘openshift-ingress-operator’ namespace. This is currently not supported in Managed OpenShift v4.13. If you wish to utilize customizable IngressControllers on Managed Openshift, please upgrade your cluster to version 4.14 or open a support case to request early access. For more information on customizable IngressControllers, see https://access.redhat.com/articles/7028653.
